title.native: 名探偵コナン 純黒の悪夢(ナイトメア)

description:
On a dark night, the Japanese police is raided by a spy. Different countries' intelligence agencies—such as England's MI6, Germany's BDN, and America's CIA—as well as the FBI's secret files are going to be taken, but public safety officers lead by Tooru Amuro arrive just in time. The spy steals a car and escapes. The spy and Amuro are then locked in a dead heat on the highway, and just as it is about to cause an accident with multiple cars, the spy's car is hit by FBI agent Shuichi Akai's rifle bullet and falls off the roadway.

The next day, Conan and his friends go to a newly-remodeled aquarium in Tokyo. Under the main attraction, a Ferris wheel, Conan finds an attractive woman alone and injured. Her left and right eyes are different colors.

But the woman is in a state of amnesia where she doesn't even remember her own name, and the cellphone she's carrying is broken. Conan and his friends promise to help her regain her memory, so they stay with her.

Throughout all this, Vermouth is watching behind the scenes. Afterwards, she pulls out a silencer and speaks into an attached intercom, "It's as planned, Gin."

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonyms: Meitantei Conan Movie 20: Junkoku no Nightmare
El Detectiu Conan: El Malson més Negre
Detective Conan: La Pesadilla más Negra
名侦探柯南：纯黑的恶梦
Detective Conan Movie 20: L'incubo più buio

title.native: 名探偵コナン

name.native: ジョディ・スターリング
ジェイムズ・ブラック

node.description:
__Favorite Food:__ Rice with curry

Gosho Aoyama, alternatively known by his real name Yoshimasa Aoyama, is a Japanese mangaka and animator, best known as the creator of Detective Conan (internationally known as Case Closed), Magic Kaito, and YAIBA.
**Tomoko Fukunaga** is a Japanese animator and animation director.
**Tomoko Fukunaga** is a Japanese animator and animation director.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/浦上靖之)

Son of [Yasuo Urakami](https://anilist.co/staff/111277/). Brother of [Keiko Urakami](https://anilist.co/staff/162367/).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/須藤昌朋)

Originating from Studio Annapuru, currently freelance.

Debuted as an in-betweener on the second season of [Ashita no Joe](https://anilist.co/anime/2921/). He is particularly known for his involvement in [TMS Entertainment's](https://anilist.co/studio/73/) works, mainly the [Detective Conan](https://anilist.co/anime/235/) franchise, in which he has served as a character designer and animation director on all of the theatrical movies.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/須藤昌朋)

Originating from Studio Annapuru, currently freelance.

Debuted as an in-betweener on the second season of [Ashita no Joe](https://anilist.co/anime/2921/). He is particularly known for his involvement in [TMS Entertainment's](https://anilist.co/studio/73/) works, mainly the [Detective Conan](https://anilist.co/anime/235/) franchise, in which he has served as a character designer and animation director on all of the theatrical movies.
Vice President of Mouse. He is responsible for managing the animation side of the studio, including production management and staff supervision.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Horidesk) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/horidesk/) | [Website](http://horidesk.m78.com)

Originating from Studio Pokke, currently freelance.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Horidesk) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/horidesk/) | [Website](http://horidesk.m78.com)

Originating from Studio Pokke, currently freelance.

[Official Site](https://bz-vermillion.com) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/Bz) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Bz_Official)

B'z  is a Japanese hard rock duo.   

Members: 
Tak Matsumoto (松本孝弘) - composition, guitar 
[Koshi Inaba](https://anilist.co/staff/264247) (稲葉浩志) - lyrics, vocals
